item.description:
Usually we meet every third Tuesday of the month, but for this month only we're moving the meetup back a week due to St Patrick's Day.

It's a casual monthly gathering. Come for dinner, a drink, or just for the conversation. There's no agenda, so come whenever you can make it and don't worry about arriving later than 6:00.

We always try to meet in the back by the TV and fireplace. There are more tables to move around back there.

Note: This meetup event is cross-posted at the Boston Young Republicans Meetup Group and on Facebook.

Don't be discouraged by the small number of RSVPs on this site; we usually have 15-25 attendees.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk to the back section near the fireplace & TV.
item.name: The Boston Republican Party March Meetup
